title: OCE Dominion
body: Please make dominion available to play (on the Oceanic Server) in the same way that twisted treelike is available, (that is make it available for the community to play at certain times/days).

replies.body: I agree. At least make it open for one of the weekend days.
I would totally play Dominion if it were available. Seems like fun, and I wish it was available other than custom games.
I miss Dominion and it's not even permanently removed yet. {{item:3070}}
this post seems a bit fucking redundant now >:( fucking riot
i think that they should switch between ARAM and Dominion. i never play ARAM i just don't like it personally, and i find dominion way more fun
But many think the opposite. If they did this they would swap it out with TT every other week or something.

i really agree with this post and i really think this should happen. I remember playing it back on the NA servers before oceanic was around and its the funnest game type in my opinion and its nothing to serious and its good to break up between 5 v 5's
